item.title: Workflow Connector Builder
item.description: Workflow Connector Builder Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 757 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders Description: A brief introduction to Workflows Connector Builder that distinguishes it from Okta Workflows the Platform and what hooks are for. Note that WCB can create flows that can also be submitted to OIN. Then redirect to the help doc area.
